channel.title: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)
channel.description:
[img]http://s8.postimg.org/cklpqfrat/TOP1.png[/img]
Focus on greatness! [b]Client Features[/b] resizeable client with 4-5 options. pk menu upon entering wilderness. precise level counter Smithing Interface RscSlay Stat Exchange [img]http://s11.postimg.org/8osjv9gir/screenshot6.png[/img]
[b]Server Features[/b] 8 Quests (possibly more in the future) all working skills (21 skills) pking skill slayer skill runecrafting skill
A centralized Edgeville to group the community together. This includes spots to mine, smith, fish, slayer tasks, and do herblaw. A new area called the Arachnid Nest -- get here by entering the cave in edgeville to fight some spiders or mine some essence. Death match arena with 4 separate rooms for fights -- safe to walk in until in a death match for spectators. *Double points in the wilderness*
Capture the Flag Events Lottery Events Many events that can be hosted.
This server will have a great balance to build a great economy.
[b]The Website[/b] [b][url=http://rscslay.com]RscSlay - oldschool runescape [/url][/b]
ps. I will update this thread as needed.

item.title: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)
item.dc:creator: @Zeymeth Zeymeth
item.description:
@Zeymeth wrote:

What happened to the server?! I just started about 4 days ago and went to log in and the site and client are not working. Hoping its not gone because I just found this an am a StorkPK veteran and point based is the only way to play RSC for me now because of it…

Read full topic
item.source: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)

item.title: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

The server has been online for a little over a month now, it is time to introduce some rares into the game and celebrate.

This weekend Christmas crackers and Gift boxes will be dropped from monsters inside the wilderness.

Inside crackers if you pop them on another player then you will get a random party hat!

Additionally, there will be some events hosted with rares as prizes.

Now is the time to start training characters to get ready to farm the monsters that will drop these RARES!
Possible double points weekend aswell.
Don’t forget you get double points inside the wilderness Always*
If you need help with that RscSlay Stat Exchange then please visit Here
Come check us out now is the time to make the best of your time playing runescape classic.
www.rscslay.com

Read full topic
item.source: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)

dope! finally a point system to change stats around.

item.title: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)
item.dc:creator: @stEps stEps
item.description:
@stEps wrote:

Thanks guys. The server is starting off fairly decent with over 20 online now.
Events will be hosted for 38 pk events ect…
Decent server here if you give it a shot. Players seem to like it.

Come join the community today guys, while its still fresh.

Read full topic
item.source: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)

item.title: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

First off.
Your cache downloader is the slowest shit on the face of this earth stop checking for individual files and download a zip and extract then check the MD5’s.
Also when it is downloading there is nothing stating said download and it just looks like the client hangs i attached the jar to my console to verify exactly what it was doing.

Second.
Registering you have captcha and then some shitty anti word bot system one or the other.

Trying to give you constructive criticism so please do not take this post as a bash but me being mad about what i had to go through.

Read full topic
item.source: RscSlay - RSC Point/Exp Server (Interchangeable Stats.Going strict Wilderness)
